title: I recently went to the Movie Gallery at Carolina Beach and found a sign on the door that they were closed and would not reopen.  Are they closed due to the poor economy in the local area?
text:
The entire Movie Gallery company just filed for bankruptcy.

Here's a link to a story today in Financial Times with details.
